skills.name: sm-bigquery-analyst
skills.description: Query SourceMedium-hosted BigQuery safely. Emits SQL receipts. SELECT-only, cost-guarded. Use when users need help with BigQuery setup, access verification, or analytical questions against SourceMedium datasets.

skills.name: sm-bigquery-analyst-manual
skills.description: Manual-only version of sm-bigquery-analyst. Query SourceMedium-hosted BigQuery safely with explicit user invocation. Emits SQL receipts. SELECT-only, cost-guarded.
